name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A blogger on Weibo found through testing that words that were originally blocked by Weibo can be displayed as long as "America" is added in front.
Then netizens began to test
(Note that the part with horizontal lines in the picture is only visible to the blogger himself, and is invisible to the reader's perspective, but it can be displayed and seen by everyone if "America" is added in front)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@chemhack Thank you for the information, I just saw it.
I have contacted the PR that I am working with, and I believe that the other party will reply to me soon.
I need to add that the other party asked me to delete the tweet on the 3rd, but I just saw it, so I deleted it. And I saw your tweet only after that.
So I deleted the tweet not because of your tweet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Beijing Zhongguancun Information Road, near the intersection of Diwu Street
A programmer is suspected to be burning paper for ChatGPT.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Just now, a murder occurred near the Beijing Workers' Stadium.
A group of young people were suspected to have a dispute after being drunk and scuffled with each other. During the dispute, a man in white stabbed a man in blue with a broken bottle (at 14 seconds), causing the man in blue to die.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Subsequent supplement: The deceased was a student of Beijing Business School. Beijing Business School explained the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 5, Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province 
A vendor took off his clothes in protest on the street because the urban management wanted to tow away his chestnut cart.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 4, the Communist Youth League Central Committee's Zhihu account quoted a line from the Japanese anime "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure", which caused a lot of ridicule

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Students from many places submitted articles saying that they were required by their schools to "sweep graves online" during the Qingming Festival

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 5, two men fought each other in the street near Chongqing Yudong. One of the men stabbed the other man several times in the neck with a knife. The specific cause is unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China Electronics Technology Group Corporation issued a statement today, saying that overtime employees are not employees of the group company.
This triggered a discussion among netizens about "establishment" and "non-establishment".
Some netizens said that "China's labor law is in name only".
Other netizens said that "we are all non-establishment employees abandoned by the trade union".
